text: Hagi maka zama eri havizama nehaza vahe'mo'za e'za Babiloni vahera hara eme huzmante'za zamazeri haviza hugahaze. Ana nehu'za harafa sondia vahe'zamia zamavare'za kina hunezamante'za, ati zamia eri'za refutagi atregahaze. Na'ankure Ra Anumzana nonahu Anumzankino, Babiloni vahe'mo'zama hu'naza avu'ava zantera tamagerfa huno nona huzmanteno zamazeri haviza hugahie.
